name: Neon of the dark Realm
description:
*Explore the deep ocean in an underwater capsule, 

*See sea creatures 

*Attract them with bioluminescent patterns of light 

*Trap them in your capsule to find out more about them

WASD for movement, mouse to click on creatures and UI 

We were expecting to have a lot more creatures to capture... but the time it took to build all the system was too much, anyway is a playable a completable game, we would greatly appreciate feedback
